byline.original: By MITCH SMITH, MONICA DAVEY and ALAN BLINDER
byline.contributor: Mitch Smith reported from Kalamazoo, Monica Davey from Chicago, and Alan Blinder from Atlanta. Reporting was contributed by Julie Bosman from Chicago, and Mike Isaac, Liam Stack and Eli Rosenberg from New York. Susan Beachy and Kitty Bennett contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The police arrested Jason B. Dalton, 45, and said they were investigating whether he had been ferrying passengers for Uber on the night of the rampage in Kalamazoo, Mich.

headline.print_headline: Random Shots on a Deadly Night for Kalamazoo
headline.main: Kalamazoo Searches for Motive in Spree That Killed 6

snippet: The police arrested Jason B. Dalton, 45, and said they were investigating whether he had been ferrying passengers for Uber on the night of the rampage in Kalamazoo, Mich.
abstract: Authorities in Kalamazoo, Mich, say six people were killed and two injured at three locations in county by single gunman Jason B Dalton, who has been arrested; Dalton, driver for Uber, picked up and drove clients before and in between shootings; no motive is immediately apparent..
